fields_of_interest: Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Sport, Climate Action

subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
The Committee has member representatives from the European Golf Association (EGA),The R&A (world governing body), the PGA ET, the LET and the PGAE. 
 
The EGA represents the national golf bodies in Europe.
goals__remit: To engage with the European Parliament and European Commission on behalf of the game of golf in order to better understand and contribute towards the legislative process and how it might impact on golf.  To disseminate information on EU legislation down to the national golf federations in Europe so that they are able to engage on a national basis.  To promote the game of golf at European legislative level and the benefits golf can bring to issues of concern to the EP and EC.
